description: The artist of the best-selling “Room-Mates” is back with a series of searing hot stories of 4 gorgeous girlfriends who aren’t afraid to get their feet very wet. Gambedotti’s talent at depicting irresistibly cute girls with tight firm curvy figures in the abandon of ecstasy only gets better with this new series!
name: Vol. 1

description: With an introduction by Moebius. An elegant setting of women who were once men! Beautiful, irresistibly feminine and with their manly attributes still bulging between their thighs! Gorgeous highly stylish art by another great Italian, reveling in the depiction of these transsexuals falling in increasing heat for each other!
name: Vol. 1

description: This new best-selling series goes full color! Our trans-sexual girls continue to explore their very mixed sexuality. Each a flower of complete feminine beauty, each equipped like men.
name: Vol. 2

description: Connie dreams of being a super-model. There's only one problem. Her hour-glass figure is too voluptuous. So, she goes to the dietician who prescribes her a supposedly miracle pill. The pills end up doing nothing for her figure, but oh, the miracle they perform on her heretofore repressed libido...! A funny wild sexual romp, much lighter than Convent of Hell but just as mouth-wateringly painted.

In a not too distant future, cyborgs rule the Earth in a society filled with vice, corruption and murder, the powerful few exploiting the masses of humans. Knowing which is which is not easy, however, and the seduction of the perfect dream bodies of the humanoid robots is very strong indeed. Man vs. machine in a sex showdown!

Story Titles

  • Survival
  • Too Human
  • The New Rebel
  • The Cure
  • Art
  • Enemy Turf
  • Terrorist Lovers
  • Reality in Danger
name: Vol. 1

description:
The cyborgs and men mix gets even more complicated with the revelation of a race of sexual vampires! An old order of Catholics try to counter but the temptations are much too great!

Story Titles

  • War of the Sexes
  • Your Days Are Numbered
  • Your Days Are Numbered Part 2
  • Lethal Virus
  • Sexual Vampires
  • The Plague
  • The Last Stronghold
  • The Last Stronghold Part 2
name: Vol. 2

description: Betty Veronica and the gang take a ride in the new plan "BV300". Then end up on the African Veldt, a mysterious island, and back home.

Notes: This issue features the first appearance of Cheryl Blossom and her brother, Jason.

Story Titles

  • Hold That Line: Archie finds out that his family was royalty
  • Dare To Be Bare: While the beach Veronica shows off a skimpy swimsuit only to be upstaged by Cheryl's outfit. (Intro-Cheryl And Jason Blossom; Reprinted in The Best Of Archie Comics Vol. 1)
  • Video Vengeance: When Veronica loses at competition (including video games) she goes into a tantrum.
  • Driven To Distraction: When Archie wants to go swimming at the beach, Veronica and Betty get distracted by everything.
name: Hold That Line

description: A heavily “Blossom” oriented issue (after a brief absence) with the first story involving Jason tricking, goading and humiliating the heroines into going to Bob’s a really awfulbackwoods shack of a “fun” spot; and Cheryl in the last 2 — in the first the girls trick her into dumping Archie from a date but he goes to a movie with Jughead instead which they find even more humiliating, and in the other she out-smarts herself in a jogging vs car “contest” when she runs out of gas.

Josie & the Cabots appear in a ½ page gag story; most of the Riverdale High staff and Chuck Clayton appear on the cover but nowhere else; Chuck’s girlfriend Nancy also appears (only) in a pin-up/fashion shot with 4 other girls

Jonathan Swift's classic takes a naughty turn. Watch how thousands of tiny Lilliputians tie Gullivera¹s barely clad beauty down to the beach, how she is used as a splayed-leg arch for their triumphant troops, and how she lets a couple of young giants play with her willingly...

Back Blurb

Jonathan Sift's classic takes a naughty turn in the savvy hands of the Italian Manara. Follow the bawdy adventures of lithe Manara-girl Gullivera through Lilliput, the land of the Giants, and the land (horny) talking horses. Watch how thousands of tiny Lilliputians tie her barely clad beauty down to the beach, how she is used as a splayed-leg arch for their triumphant troops, how she lets a couple of young giants play with her willingly and how she meets an airborne group of women so desperate for attention from their unattentative men, they resort to loud S&M parties between themselves. Funny, light and beautifully Manara.

A Taiwanese sex comic! Kung-Fu masters become unwittingly or earnestly involved in the weirdest practices to save their lives! Watch how in one episode "Way of the Swordsmen- the Ultimate Bedroom Skills" helps in fighting off the enemy and avenging their master!

Beautiful, raunchy and satirical, this exotic fully painted graphic novel will arouse and amuse!
name: Vol. 2

description:
Learn more about the art of Kung Fu Sex! Blow away your enemies with acrobatic positions. More beautifully painted mayhem, sex and laughs in this outrageous series!

Back Blurb

Learn the secrets of the masters: moves that kill without a fight! Moves that will also greatly satisfy your concubine! It's Kung Fu Sex! Awesome moves such as "Riding the Dragon", "Climb Up and Slide Down", and the explosive "The Column that Lifts the Skies" will bring new life to your sex and sharpen your kung fu all at the same time!

Story Titles

  • Secret Manuscript
  • The Great Challenge
  • Exchanging Souls
  • The Inn of the Bizarre Name
  • The Imposter
  • The Tournament
  • The Nude
  • Chicken Divine
name: Vol. 1

description:
Sleazy alien moneylenders, monsters on the rampage, and a ticking time bomb may all be in a day's work for Gin, but a drop in his blood sugar level means trouble for everyone!

Chapter Titles

  • Lesson 1: Nobody with Natural Wavy Hair Can Be That Bad
  • Lesson 2: Responsible Owners Should Clean Up After Their Pets
  • Lesson 3: Watch Out! Weekly Shōnen Jump Sometimes Comes Out on Saturdays!
  • Lesson 4: People Who Make Good First Impressions Usually Suck
  • Lesson 5: Make Friends You Can Call By Their Nicknames, Even When You're an Old Fart
  • Lesson 6: If You Jerks Have Enough Time to Spread Terror, You'd Better Go Walk Your Dog, Pero
  • Bonus Story! The Artist's First Manga Ever: Dandilion
name: Nobody with Naturally Wavy Hair Can Be That Bad

description:
Love is in the air! Gin helps an escaped convict make amends with his daughter, fights a duel with the love-struck chief of the secret police, and tracks down a dying man's childhood sweetheart, who has seen better days...

Chapter Titles

  • Lesson 007. "Keep a Promise Even If It Kills You"
  • Lesson 008. "There is Butt a Fine Line Between Persistence and Stubbornness"
  • Lesson 009. "Fighting Should Be Done With Fists"
  • Lesson 010. "Eat Something Sour When You're Tired"
  • Lesson 011. "Look, Overly Sticky Sweet Dumplings are Not Dumplings, You Idiot!"
  • Lesson 012. "Young Girls Across the Country, Get Home Before Curfew"
  • Lesson 013. "Only Dirty Things are Born of Toilets"
  • "Shirokuro"

Shirokuro is the story of a young man who fights evil doers & demons with a baseball bat as a weapon. It a One Shot by Hideaki Sorachi published as an extra at the end of the volume.
name: Fighting Should Be Done With Fists

description:
Gin's "to do" list for this volume:

1. Pick a fight with those Shinsengumi losers

2. Throw out my old SHONEN JUMP magazines

3. Save Shinpachi and Kagara AGAIN

4. Take Kagura's so-called dog for a walk

5. Protect the environment

Chapter Titles

  • Lesson 014. "If You're Going to Cosplay, Go All Out"

Captain Gintoki & Captain Zura ( it Katsura!) team up to find the One Pack! Not really, it was just a clever trap to infiltrate & destroy the evil Amanto's pirates that kidnapped Kagura & Shinpachi.

  • Lesson 015. "Boys Have a Weird Ritual that Makes Them Think They Turn into Men When They Touch a Frog"

The Shinsengumi are summoned to protect an important member of the government against attacks from a rebel force, even if some members don’t take the task too seriously.

  • Lesson 016. "If You Stop and Think About It, Your Life's a Lot Longer as an Old Guy Than a Kid! Whoa, Scary!!"

The useless man finally got his act together and found a new job as a cab driver, but how long can he keep his true nature at bay while encountering a combination of a new friend, an old employer & a pregnant woman?

  • Lesson 017. "Even if You Aren't Drunk, Pretend You Are and Steal Your Boss's Toupee"

The fight between the Shinsengumi and Gintoki’s group is finally on! Indeed, a terrible battle of hit & cover rock, paper, scissors follows a small dispute for the right to the best cherry tree blossom viewing location. Who will win this terrible contest of ability & speed?

  • Lesson 018. "If You're a Man, Try the Swordfish!"

A kappa like Amanto is attacked by a bunch of people that want to destroy the land where he lives. Gintoki, Kagura & Shinpachi deeply touched by his story decide to help him repel the attacks of these enemies of nature.

  • Lesson 019. "Even Teen Idols Act Like You Guys"

Once Shinpachi was desperate, on the verge to quit everything than he stumbled on a street performer that instantly made him regain hope in life. Years later that girl is now an idol and in urgent need of help because there is out there someone that want her dead and Shinpachi is the man of the situation.

  • Lesson 020. "Pets Resemble Their Owners"

Katsura is back and he’s not alone, there is a strange creature following him around, is it name. Following the arrival of the new animal an unexplainably well timed strange pets contest start, it now a showdown between Gin Tama two favourites creatures, versus Sadaharu!

  • Lesson 021. "Kids' Annoyance Factor is Proportional to the Length of Their Hair"

There’s a pyromaniac running around free in and Gintoki goes out of his ways to help a young aspiring firewoman in her quest to catch the culprit.

  • Lesson 022. "Stress Makes You Bald, But Its Stressful to Avoid Stress, so You End Up Stressed Out Anyway, so In the End There's Nothing You Can Do"

The continuation & end of the firewoman story arc. The pyromaniac is discovered a little too late for our heroes and an old man end up trapped in a burning building, the only thing that can save him is a daughter & father combo that use this opportunity to save their relationship as well as the old man.
name: If You're a Man, Try the Swordfish!

description:
Everyone desperately attempts to get some R & R this time! Our cute and invincible warrior Kagura spirits a genuine princess out of the confines of her castle to shop for candy, gamble her riches, and fish for kappa (water spirits)--all while dodging a troop of elite police. But rest looks to be in the stars when Kagura wins an outer-space trip for three. Unfortunately, her relaxing vacation with her pals is continually interrupted by dognappers, spaceship hijackers, and giant sand monsters. Fortunately, the Odd Jobs Trio returns home just in time for a soothing summer festival. Until…robots run amuck!

Chapter Titles

  • Lesson 023. "You Only Gotta Wash Under the Armpits---Just the Armpits"

Kagura accepts to become the friend of a runaway princess and to show her how to have fun, but the Shinsengumi won’t let that happen.

  • Lesson 024. "Exaggerate the Tales of Your Exploits by a Third, so Everyone Has a Good Time"

Cats Punch, a group of interplanetary thief are in town and they want Catherine to join back, no matters what she got to say about it.

  • Lesson 025. "You Say Kawaiiii so Often, You Must Think You're Cute Stuff"

Ham-girl is back with a job for Gintoki, rescuing her boyfriend from a bunch of assassin’s part of a local yakuza group.

  • Lesson 026. "You Can Forget to Bring Spare Undies on a Voyage, Just Don't Forget UNO"

Kagura win three tickets for a space trip and decide to take Gintoki & Shinpachi with her. While in space they meet with an old friend of Gin and a bunch of terrorist that want to take all the passengers as hostage. The trio eventually stop them but now they are at the mercy of a ship without a pilot until Tatsuma appear to save the day!

  • Lesson 027. "When You're in a Fix, Keep on Laughing, Laughing..."

Well it seems even Tatsuma could not save that ship from crashing into a distant planet, but his crew came to help soon enough. We also get a glimpse of Tatsuma & Gintoki past in the defence force and see a little of Gin heroism personality.

  • Lesson 028. "Oh Yeah! Our Crib is Number One!"

There a panty thief on the loose, will our heroes be able to catch him or will they destroy themselves with their elaborates plans to protect the sanctity of Tae?

  • Lesson 029. "You Really Think You Can Study for Exams By Listening to Music!? Turn it off Already!!"

Ms. Otose send Gintoki on a mission in the neighbourhood to get rid of some irritating noise, only to find an old man working on robots for a upcoming festival. While the old man is in despair due to the destruction of his project for the event he receives the visit of an old acquaintance that goes by the name of Shinsuke Takasugi.

  • Lesson 030. "Its Not the Bad Guys Who Cause Calamities, Its the Hyperactive Types"

The festival begins! Everything is pretty dull until the main event begins, the old man robots make big fireworks but their real aim seems to be the Shogun.

  • Lesson 031. "Sons Only Take After Their Father's Negative Attributes"

We learn that the old man son was abandoned by the government when they allied themselves with the amanto and rejected the samurai ways, so he finally get to inflict some revenge by attacking the shogun. So Gintoki’s and the Shinsengumi’s team up to prevent a bloodbath and help the old man to get over is hatred for the government in place.
name: Exaggerate the Tales of Your Exploits by a Third, so Everyone Has a Good Time

description:
Yoruzuya Trio Will Work for Food

1. Sea Monster extermination

2. Traveling exorcism

3. Convenience-store sitting/motorcycle gang thrashing

4. Rescuing kidnapping victims (willing and unwilling)

Special Skills

Pachinko, TV shopping, participating in shotgun weddings, and much much more!

Chapter Titles

  • Lesson 032. "Why's the Sea so Salty? Because You City Folk Pee Whenever You Go Swimming!"
  • Lesson 033. "Watch Out for Conveyor Belts!"
  • Lesson 034. "Guys with Inferiority Complexes Get Big Jobs Done"
  • Lesson 035. "Don't Panic---There's a Return Policy!"
  • Lesson 036. "Don't Be Shy---Just Raise Your Hand and Say It"
  • Lesson 037. "Stop Riding Your Bike Like You're In a Biker Gang"
  • Lesson 038. "Okama Know About Everything, From Men's Stupidity to Women's Craftiness"
  • Lesson 039. "Cute Faces Are Always Hiding Something"
  • Lesson 040. "Marriage is Prolonging an Illusion for Your Whole Life"
name: Watch Out for Conveyor Belts!

description:
Yoruzuya Trio Hunting and Gathering List

  1. Zombie bear with mysterious mushroom growing out of head (magic?)
  2. Crab chock-full of food poisoning (yum!)
  3. Hot nurse in hospital (where we wind up due to #2)
  4. Goro, queen of the human-size cockroaches (no comment)
  5. 100 ice cream mini-cups (yum!)
  6. The truth behind a cult that purports to make your dreams a reality (dream on…)

Chapter Titles

  • Lesson 041. Think for a Minute Now, Do Matsutake Mushrooms Really Taste All That Good?
  • Lesson 042. Grab Your Dreams with Your Fists
  • Lesson 043. All Men Are Romantics
  • Lesson 044. Some Things Can't Be Cut with a Sword
  • Lesson 045. Good Things Never Come in Twos (but Bad Things Do)
  • Lesson 046. The More Delicious the Food, The Nastier It Is When It Goes Bad
  • Lesson 047. I Told You to Pay Attention to The News!
  • Lesson 048. People with Dark Pasts Can't Shut Up
  • Lesson 049. Once You've Used a Washlet, You'll Never Use a Regular Toilet Again
name: Vol. 6

description:
Yoruzuya Hit List (Exploding Targets)

  1. The Shinsegumi elite police and Gin (innocent bystander)
  2. Chief Kondo and Gin's new workplace (during their shift)
  3. Human shields named Kondo, Yamazaki, and Gin
  4. The special New Year's issue of Shonen Jump magazine and Gin
  5. Gin's apartment (more than once)
  6. Fireworks and...not Gin.

Chapter Titles

  • Lesson 50 - You Always Remember the Things that Matter the Least
  • Lesson 51 - Life Moves on Like a Conveyor Belt
  • Lesson 52 - Playgrounds are for Kids
  • Lesson 53 - Prayer Won't Make Your Worldly Prayers Go Away! Control Yourself
  • Lesson 54 - Mistaking Someone's Name is Rude!
  • Lesson 55 - Ramen Shops with Long Menus Never Do Well
  • Lesson 56 - Eating Ice Cream in Winter is Awesome
  • Lesson 57 - What's the Bonbon Mean in Whiskey Bonbon ?
  • Lesson 58 - Give a Thought to Planned Pregnancy
name: Vol. 7

description:
Do's and Don'ts for Daddy-Daughter Day

  1. Don't let alien monsters grow exponentially by siphoning energy from space terminals and then eating your daughter
  2. Do show your dad you've learned to use your abnormal strength to help others--not hurt them
  3. Do respect your daughter's planetary preferences, especially when they're submitted in writing
  4. Don't assassinate your daughter's boyfriend

Chapter Titles

  • Lesson 59 - Always Knock Before Opening the Bathroom Door
  • Lesson 60 - You Can't Judge a Movie by Its Title
  • Lesson 61 - You Know What Happens if You Pee on a Worm
  • Lesson 62 - You Only Live With Your Father for About Twenty Years...So Be Nice to Him !
  • Lesson 63 - Just Slug Your Daughter's Boyfriend and Get It Over With
  • Lesson 64 - Make Characters So Anybody Can Tell Who They Are Just By Their Silhouettes
  • Lesson 65 - You Can't Judge a Person By His Appearance, Either
  • Lesson 66 - Do Cherries Come From Cherry Trees?
  • Lesson 67 - Why are Masochists So Tough?
name: Vol. 8

description:
Gin's Ho-Hum Weekend To-Do List

  1. Stock up on paper napkins and stain remover.
  2. Think of a good excuse not to buy Hasegawa a new shirt.
  3. Find out what kind of monster would swipe my strawberry milk from the fridge.
  4. Get tickets to the game at Edo Dome while it's still standing.
  5. Tell Shinpachi, Kondo and Matsudaira they're buying if they want me to go for drinks with them.

Chapter Titles

  • Lesson 68 - The Moon Knows Everything
  • Lesson 69 - Mom's Busy Too, So Quit Complaining About What's for Dinner
  • Lesson 70 - Life Without Gambling Is Like Sushi Without Wasabi
  • Lesson 71 - Stop Drinking While You Still Feel Good
  • Lesson 72 - Walk Your Dog at an Appropriate Speed
  • Lesson 73 - One Bark Is Sweeter than a Million Songs
  • Lesson 74 - Adults Only. We Wouldn't Want Anyone Immature in Here ... Lesson 75 - The More You're Alike, the More You Fight
  • Lesson 76 - Whatever You Play, Play To Win!
name: Vol. 9

description:
Gin's "Five Things They Don't Teach You in Samurai School" List

  1. Gold can be found in the strangest places (not always up your nose).
  2. Talking smack to a blind swordsman is NEVER a good idea.
  3. Stomping on giant beetles the size of small cars is both messy and really dangerous.
  4. When the scariest thing in your haunted house is one of your customers, just pack up and go home for the day.
  5. Just because your date has cat ears doesn't necessarily mean she's an alien.

Chapter Titles

  • Lesson 77 - Milk Should Be Served at Body Temperature
  • Lesson 78 - The Maid Saw Everything
  • Lesson 79 - If You Want to See Someone, Make an Appointment First
  • Lesson 80 - Always Show Up for a Date 30 Minutes Early
  • Lesson 81 - "If You Go to Sleep with the Fan On, You'll Get a Stomachache, So Be Careful
  • Lesson 82 - Like a Haunted House, Life is Full of Horrors
  • Lesson 83 - Rhinoceros Beetles Teach Boys that Life is Precious
  • Lesson 84 - Even an Inch-long Insect Has a Soul
  • Lesson 85 - Even on the Net, Use at Least a Minimum of Courtes
name: Vol. 10

description:
Gin's Surefire Dating Tips

  1. Chicks with cat ears that you meet online are always hiding something.
  2. Riding with a cute girl on the back of your scooter is cool (but watch out for the rocket boost).
  3. Never allow partially a blind ninja to take care of your wounds (even if she looks hot in a nurse's uniform).
  4. When getting involved in a coup d'etat, remember to bring your umbrella (what's that got to do with dating?!)

Chapter Titles

  • Lesson 86 - Love Doesn't Require a Manual
  • Lesson 87 - For the Wind is the Life
  • Lesson 88 - The Ideal Girlfriend is Always Minami
  • Lesson 89 - Croquette Sandwiches are Always the Most Popular Food Sold at the Stalls
  • Lesson 90 - Misfortune Never Arrives Alone
  • Lesson 91 - The Full Moon Drives People Crazy
  • Lesson 92 - Be Careful Not To Leave Your Umbrella Somewhere
  • Lesson 93 - Fools and Villains Love High Places
  • Lesson 94 - The Sun Rises Again Gin's Surefire Dating Tips
name: Vol. 11

description:
Things I've Learned While Living with Gin (by Kagura)

  1. Buildings get destroyed because they are in the way.
  2. If you're going to stalk someone, watch out for pit-traps!
  3. People who say Santa doesn't really exist actually want to believe in him.
  4. Some people (Shinpachi) are always the butt of the joke.
  5. No matter what Gin says, ice cream is a great prize for winning a snowball fight, uh-huh!

Chapter Titles

  • Lesson 95 - Bugs that live in darkness love the light
  • Lesson 96 - Polish a sword with patience
  • Lesson 97 - Save for a rainy day
  • Lesson 98 - To deceive another is to deceive oneself
  • Lesson 99 - The person who insists on saying "there is no such thing as Santa Claus" is really the one who wishes the most for Santa Claus to come
  • Lesson 100 - Namemono is a reflection of life
  • Lesson 101 - Be careful of the captain for a day, frau rottenmaier!
  • Lesson 102 - Because I am me
  • Lesson 103 - Only children get excited when they see the snow
name: Vol. 12

description:
Gin's Street Fighting Lessons Learned (Top 5)

  1. Frontal wedgies are extremely effective.
  2. Girls hit a lot harder the more innocent they look (unless they are alien gorillas).
  3. Only morons start fights in the Ninja Bar. Yeah, only morons...
  4. Using a bazooka is cheating (but it sure settles things quickly).
  5. No one hits harder than Shinpachi's sister Otae when she's riled.

Chapter Titles

  • Lesson 104 - Almost every mother is the same
  • Lesson 105 - Too much kaki-pi is bad for you
  • Lesson 106 - Don't make any chewing noises while you are eating
  • Lesson 107 - Flower shops and Cake shops are the Weaknesses of men and girls
  • Lesson 108 - Maibou actually fills you up
  • Lesson 109 - Dumplings over flowers
  • Lesson 110 - All you can do now is suffer silently and cook red bean rice
  • Lesson 111 - Watch the Sakata family drama over dinner at 7pm; Tuesday evenings
  • Lesson 112 - Yesterday's Enemy is Somehow Today's Enemy As Well
name: Vol. 13

description:
When you smash the dish that's strapped to my head

You're doing it for honor so it's all okay

Sandpaper makes lousy toilet tissue (someone said)

You can use my picture (but you're gonna pay)

Don't fight for Otae (Shinpachi should)

Oh, baby, you make it hurt so gooood!

Chapter Titles

  • Lesson 113 - Handle breakable items with care
  • Lesson 114 - Either blood or bandages...I'm Envious of how cool it looks
  • Lesson 115 - Those who show a strong preference in food respond to people with equal directness.
  • Lesson 116 - You shouldn't pick things up just because you're feeling upset
  • Lesson 117 - Do it Before you've done it
  • Lesson 118 - If There's Four people, It Is A Lot Of Knowledge
  • Lesson 119 - Every word has its opposite
  • Lesson 120 - Everyone Makes Mistakes
  • Lesson 121 - When a Guy Who Wears Glasses Suddenly Removes Them it Feels Like Part of Them is Missing.
name: Vol. 14

description:
Introducing another hot Spaniard from the sizzling pages of the European sexy comics mag Kiss!

Lolita's life and fantasies would be enough to set even Belzebub on fire! She and her equally voluptuous sister mix and match with a seemingly endless parade of massively hung studs. Unbridled sheer fun fantasy.
name: Vol. 1

description: Another steaming batch of Spanish hot stuff relating the sexual adventures of dark-haired voluptuous Lolita and her blond equally curvy every man's got a third leg!
name: Vol. 2

description: Spanish hot babe Lolita and her blonde sister Marga hire out a male stripper for a good time only to be paid by him after they're finished! Visiting Morocco, they teach a couple of virgin studs a trick or two... two hunks save Lolita from a stick up; their reward: a double entry "stick-up" in her squeeze box! And more raunchy fun...
name: Vol. 3

description:
SHE’S BACK!! The wanton wench from Espana shows us once again with gusto how it’s done! This long-anticipated new collection of the best-selling series has her dabbling with double penetration in each orifice, fisting, whipping and hot wax, melting the hard hearts of a couple of cops only to totally take advantage of them and all, of course, with outrageously well-hung studs. This babe don’t bother with less than twelve inches! See Belore’s art improve amazingly from story to story. From gorgeous to the raunchily sublime!

----------

Lolita¹s life and fantasies would be enough to set even Belzebub on fire. She and her equally voluptuous female friends mix and match with a seemingly endless parade of massively hung studs. Unbridled sheer fun fantasy...
name: Vol. 4

description: A few engineers, men and women, bored on a spaceship filled with sex offenders put to deep sleep. Until one devises a way of occasionally waking up good-looking pervs for a quickie then putting 'em back to beddie-by. Once the technique gets around, though, things get slightly out of hand! The beautiful captain is compelled to role-play to get 'em under control!

This is one reality show you won’t see on prime time! The dares and challenges here and the mixing up of contestants is about as red hot as late-night pay-per-view cable could handle! With very sharp art by the Italian Messina.

Oh, much more than room-mates! Got a space in your apartment to let? Why not find a willing sex mate as well? And hey, if the roomie don’t put up, out she goes! Fun, raunchy situations from a pair of horny Spanish artists!
name: Vol. 1
